feed.title: Mount Carleton (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. High zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023
